targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(request_ts, $__interval),
  client_name as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM
  log_entries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(request_ts)
GROUP BY
  1,
  2
ORDER BY
  1,
  2 asc

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(request_ts, $__interval),
  COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) as clients
FROM
  log_entries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(request_ts)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    client_name,
    question_type,
    question_name,
    count(*) as cnt
FROM 
  log_entries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(request_ts) 
GROUP BY
  client_name,
  question_name,
  question_type
ORDER BY cnt desc
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
    question_name,
    question_type,
    count(*) as cnt
FROM 
  log_entries
WHERE
  response_type = 'BLOCKED' AND
  $__timeFilter(request_ts) 
GROUP BY
  client_name,
  question_name,
  question_type
ORDER BY cnt desc
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
  client_name,
  question_name,
  question_type,
  duration_ms,
  request_ts,
  response_code,
  reason
FROM
  log_entries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(request_ts) 
ORDER BY
  request_ts DESC
limit 50;

SELECT
  client_name,
  question_name,
  question_type,
  request_ts
FROM
  log_entries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(request_ts) AND
  response_type = 'BLOCKED'
ORDER BY
  request_ts DESC
limit 50;
